Package ooga.model.engine.running

Class ClickExecutor

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.engine.running.ClickExecutor
Direct Known Subclasses:
MoveClickExecutor, PlaceClickExecutor
public abstract class ClickExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
Meant to process clicks from the front end and execute the proper actions on the board

  • Method Details

    • executeClick

      protected abstract boolean executeClick​(int xClickPosition, int yClickPosition, java.lang.String currentPlayerTurn)
      Executes a click based on the position of the click and the name of the player who's turn it is
      Parameters:
      xClickPosition - The x coordinate of the click
      yClickPosition - The y coordinate of the click
      currentPlayerTurn - The string representing the current player's turn
      Returns:
      True if a move was executed, false otherwise

    • setGameRules

      public void setGameRules​(GameRules gameRules)
      Sets the game rules associated with the current game
      Parameters:
      gameRules - the GameRules.java object associated with the currect game

    • checkProperTeamTurn

      protected boolean checkProperTeamTurn​(int x, int y, java.lang.String currentPlayerTurn)
      Checks to see if it is the proper team's turn
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the click
      y - The y coordinate of the click
      currentPlayerTurn - The string of the current player's turn
      Returns:
      True if it is the right team's turn, false otherwise

    • setIfNoTurnRules

      protected void setIfNoTurnRules​(java.lang.Boolean rules)
      Sets whether turn rules are currently being followed
      Parameters:
      rules - False if they are, true if they are not

    • setBoard

      protected void setBoard​(GameBoard board)
      Sets the board being used to execute clicks
      Parameters:
      board - The GameBoard object
